text: Similar studies have been performed using bank vole cells infected with PUUV [ 78 ] . Embryonic fibroblasts inoculated with PUUV did not express increased amounts of Ifnβ or Mx2 , although non - related viruses were able to induce up - regulation of these genes . This suggests , as with SEOV , PUUV efficiently antagonizes host innate responses in its natural reservoir .
